Description.Text: Authentic. Playful. For guests who favor South Beach hotels that are eclectic over elegant, cultured over cookie-cutter. Here it’s all about embracing what’s fun, friendly and familiar. And just a few steps from the beach, naturally.

Espanola Way is a soulful one-block stretch of Mediterranean-inspired magic in the heart of Miami Beach. The city’s first historic district, it is home to El Paseo Hotel, a Spanish Mediterranean boutique hotel featuring beautifully appointed guest rooms, in walking distance to Lincoln Road, Ocean Drive and the Beach.
No restaurant on property, countless alternatives in walking distance.
This accommodation has a very small lobby.
